stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Abyssal Secret: The Missing Link of the Deep!
stories.fantasy_story: The wisest wizards of the coastal towers have finally solved a great mystery of the Abyssal Depths. They learned why mighty sea beasts frequent the shadowy twilight waters. It seems elusive mid-sized creatures, like the greatscale pomfret, connect the food chains of the dark abyss to the sunlit surface, rising at night to feed.
